prerequisite.0.1: Advanced Network Theory: Delving into the intricacies of network structures in biological systems, exploring small-world and scale-free networks.
prerequisite.0.2: Statistical Mechanics Foundations: Understanding the principles of statistical mechanics, essential for grasping complex system behaviors.
prerequisite.0.3: Mathematical Tools for Biophysics: Familiarizing with the mathematical tools and techniques commonly used in biophysical research.
prerequisite.0.4: Systems Biology Overview: Gaining a broad understanding of how biological systems function as a whole, integrating various components.
prerequisite.0.5: Introduction to Coarse-Graining: Exploring the basics of coarse-graining methodologies in the context of biological systems.
prerequisite.0.6: Epistemology in Complex Systems: Discussing the philosophical aspects of knowledge acquisition in complex systems.
prerequisite.0.7: Preparatory Research Methods: Enhancing research skills, focusing on methods relevant to complex systems in biophysics.
prerequisite.0.8: Computational Modeling Basics: Building a foundation in computational modeling as applied to biophysical systems.
prerequisite.0.9: Critical Reading and Analysis: Developing skills for critically reading and analyzing scientific literature in complex systems.

main_curriculum.1.1: In-depth Network Analysis: Advanced techniques and applications in network analysis specific to biophysical systems.
main_curriculum.1.2: Quantitative Modeling in Biophysics: Developing and applying quantitative models to understand complex biophysical systems.
main_curriculum.1.3: Advanced Coarse-Graining Techniques: Exploring sophisticated coarse-graining methods and their implications in biological networks.
main_curriculum.1.4: Philosophy of Complex Systems: A deeper exploration into the epistemological questions surrounding complex systems.
main_curriculum.1.5: Applied Computational Modeling: Hands-on experience with computational modeling, tailored to biophysical research.
main_curriculum.1.6: Research Methodology Advancement: Advancing research methods, focusing on innovative approaches in complex systems.
main_curriculum.1.7: Critical Analysis and Synthesis: Enhancing abilities to synthesize and critically analyze emerging research in biophysics.
main_curriculum.1.8: Special Topics in Biophysical Complex Systems: Exploring current and cutting-edge topics in the field of biophysical complex systems.
main_curriculum.1.9: Research Project Design: Guidance in designing a rigorous research project in the realm of complex biophysical systems.
main_curriculum.1.10: Comprehensive Review and Assessment: A thorough review and assessment to solidify your understanding and application of concepts in complex biophysical systems.
